header.gameNote: OREGON RAIN INVITATIONAL AT CORVALLIS OR

article.headline: Southeastern Louisiana 63, Portland 55
article.story: CORVALLIS, Ore. (AP) -- Daryl Cowen had 23 points and three rebounds to lead Southeastern Louisiana to a 63-55 victory over Portland in the Oregon Rain Invitational tournament Sunday. Quennell Green added 13 points and Kevyn Green 12 for the Lions, who went undefeated in three games in the four-team, round-robin tournament at Gill Coliseum. Jamie Jones had 22 points and seven rebounds for Portland (0-3). Southeastern Louisiana's Kevyn Green, the nephew of Oregon State great A.C. Green, scored the first four points of the second half as the Lions went ahead 34-21. A Cowen 3-pointer made it 42-30 before Portland went on an 11-0 run, including seven by center Patrick Sullivan, to get within one with seven minutes remaining. The Lions (3-0) went ahead 51-45 with 4:32 left on the second of two Kevyn Green 3-pointers in a two-minute stretch. Southeastern Louisiana made its free throws down the stretch to hold on for the win. Cowen and Kevyn Green combined for 27 of the Lions' 33 second-half points. Southeastern Louisiana made 11 of 29 3-point attempts, including six from Cowen. Portland was 3-of-14. Portland scored 11 straight to go head 15-9 with 10 minutes remaining in the first half. Southeastern Louisiana answered with a 21-4 run to end the half, and led 30-21 at halftime. Quennell Green had 13 points at the break, including three 3-pointers.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
